Name: PlexAnnouncer
Overview: A Discord bot that sends updates about your plex media to a Discord channel using webhooks. Please see the support thread for more details on how to set it up and configure Discord and Plex.

Webhook Port.Name: Webhook Port
Webhook Port.Description: The port for incoming webhooks from Plex, it must match the port specified in the webhook url in your plex settings.

Plex Server URL.Name: Plex Server URL
Plex Server URL.Description: The url pointing to your Plex server, you can obtain it from the external url of one of your Plex server libraries.

Plex Webhook Token.Name: Plex Webhook Token
Plex Webhook Token.Description: Some randomly generated token, you can put anything alphanumeric in here.

Discord Webhook URL.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Discord Webhook URL.Description: The url of your Discord webhook, retrieve it from your server webhook settings.

Updated Libraries.Name: Updated Libraries
Updated Libraries.Description: List of libraries that will be checked, if this is empty all libraries will be checked.
